about_the_game:
With intricate puzzles to solve, hidden objects to find, and scares to face, you're about to experience a horror game like no other.



In our game, you and your friends can play up to 4 player co-op to uncover the mysteries hidden behind every terrifying corner. You will have to work together to find clues, solve puzzles, and progress through the story. You will face challenges that test your intelligence, your creativity, and your ability to work in a team. Every detail matters, every piece of the puzzle can help you find the solution.

But be careful, you are not alone in this adventure. The evil spirits that haunt the place are watching and stalking you relentlessly. Frightening noises, moving shadows, disturbing apparitions will make you feel constant anxiety. Monsters can pop up at any time to startle and terrify you. Your only chance for survival is to stick together and help each other.



To add even more fun, you can play against the Twitch chat. Spectators can influence your gaming experience by helping you out or making you more difficult. They can also give you additional challenges to complete to unlock rewards or change the game environment for even scarier experiences.

Moreover, you can use cheats to scare your friends by playing tricks during your game. For example, make ghosts appear in their screen, and many others.

Prepare to break out in a cold sweat, jump in fear and scream at every turn in this unforgettable multiplayer horror game. Will you successfully solve the puzzles and defeat the evil spirits or will you succumb to your deepest fears? Dive into the horror with your friends and experience it for yourself.

highlighted.name: La lumière au bout du tunnel

content_descriptors.notes: Certaines images , sons et autres contiennent du caractère violent

detailed_description:

In our game, you and your friends can play up to 4 player co-op to uncover the mysteries hidden behind every terrifying corner. You will have to work together to find clues, solve puzzles, and progress through the story. You will face challenges that test your intelligence, your creativity, and your ability to work in a team. Every detail matters, every piece of the puzzle can help you find the solution.

But be careful, you are not alone in this adventure. The evil spirits that haunt the place are watching and stalking you relentlessly. Frightening noises, moving shadows, disturbing apparitions will make you feel constant anxiety. Monsters can pop up at any time to startle and terrify you. Your only chance for survival is to stick together and help each other.



To add even more fun, you can play against the Twitch chat. Spectators can influence your gaming experience by helping you out or making you more difficult. They can also give you additional challenges to complete to unlock rewards or change the game environment for even scarier experiences.

Moreover, you can use cheats to scare your friends by playing tricks during your game. For example, make ghosts appear in their screen, and many others.

Will you successfully solve the puzzles and defeat the evil spirits or will you succumb to your deepest fears? Dive into the horror with your friends and experience it for yourself.
name: Nightmare: Les Origines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600k or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 4 Gb or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700x or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8 Gb or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: "Nightmare: Origins" is a multiplayer horror game for four players that immerses you in a nightmarish world between the realm of the dead and the realm of the living.Do you dare to face your fears and unravel the mysteries of Nightmare: Origins?
supported_languages:
French*, English, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
